resources.string:
City Chemist is one of the most trusted pharmacy in Chandigarh, since August 15, 1989. The shop is run by Mr. Ajay Aggarwal who shows the utmost dedication to his work and sees customer satisfaction as a priority.
All kinds of Modern medicines are available at the store.
The store also sells all types of body care products such as toiletries, babycare products including all kinds of nutritious oils, talcs and health supplements.
Mr. Aggarwal is a trained Pharmacist with a Pharmacy degree, and has years of experience with medicines.
